message.content:
1. Weight-loss results were maintained at a 3-month follow-up.
2. Approximately 25% of MIC patients achieved at least 5% weight-loss.
3. Approximately 25% of NPC patients achieved at least 5% weight-loss.
4. The weight-loss achievement did not differ by BED status.

messages.content:
Statement: Weight-loss results maintained at 3-month follow-up: approximately 25% MIC and NPC patients achieved at least 5% weight-loss which did not differ by BED status.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
